section.title: Interrupt Collector Simulation code preview
section.para: It is complemented by the simstm code in the tb/simstm folder of the repository and should be used for HDL testbench development to operate the InterruptCollector.
The original file can be found in the generated src-gen/simstm folder.
The entry point for simulation is the testMain.stm file found in the tb/simstm folder..
